project.name: jaxb-xmltransient
project.description: JAXB @XmlTransient annotation behavior POC. JAXB marshalls private fields from a super class if it's annotated with @XmlAccessorType(XmlAccessType.FIELD). The only way to prevent that is to annotate the parent class with @XmlTransient, use @XmlAccessorType(XmlAccessType.PROPERTY) on the subclass, override the getter method and mark the getter method @XmlTransient.
